document.discussion_title: What’s 6-feet long, scaly, and full of teeth? Your neighbor’s pet
document.topic_text: This gator was removed from a Long Island home on Sunday. This pet would have had no qualms about biting the hand — and body — that feeds it! Wildlife officials hauled a six-foot alligator out of a Medford , Long Island home Sunday
document.post: This gator was removed from a Long Island home on Sunday. This pet would have had no qualms about biting the hand — and body — that feeds it! Wildlife officials hauled a six-foot alligator out of a Medford , Long Island home Sunday
